list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Investigations tab now displays investigation list and controls.

marker.ph:
<<Window.Resources> <Style x:Key="ListBoxStyle" TargetType="{x:Type ListBox}"> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0"/> </Style> </Window.Resources> <DockPanel> <Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <Separator /> </MenuItem> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl> <TabItem Header="General"> <ListBox x:Name="ListBox" > <Label x:Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="Checksum:"/> <Label x:Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="Steam ID:" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label x:Name="SizeLabel" Content="Size:"/> <Label x:Name="FilePathLabel" Content="FilePath:"/> </ListBox> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List Display --> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> <!-- Investigation Details --> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List --> <DockPanel Grid.Column="0"> <ListBox DockPanel.Dock="Left" x:Name="InvestigationVisibleList" ItemsSource="{Binding InvestigationCollection}" SelectionChanged="InvestigationList_SelectionChanged" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" > <ListBox.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <TextBlock Text="{Binding InvestigationTitle}" /> </DataTemplate> </ListBox.ItemTemplate> </ListBox> </DockPanel> <!-- Investigation Details --> <Grid Grid.Column="1" x:Name="CurrentInvestigationVisible"> <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Goal&Rank --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Monsters --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Stats --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Values --> <RowDefinition Height="14*" /> <!-- Rewards --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Rewards Display --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Utility Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button> </Grid> <!-- Goal --> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" ItemsSource = "{Binding GoalChoices, Mode = OneWay, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Goal, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding RankChoices, Mode = OneWay, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding InvestigationRank, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Monsters --> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" IsChecked="{Binding M1Temper, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, IsAsync=True}">Tempered</CheckBox> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" IsChecked="{Binding M2Temper, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, IsAsync=True}">Tempered</CheckBox> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" IsChecked="{Binding M3Temper, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, IsAsync=True}">Tempered</CheckBox> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding MonsterChoices, Mode = OneWay, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Mon1, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding MonsterChoices, Mode = OneWay, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Mon2, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding MonsterChoices, Mode = OneWay, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Mon3, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Stats --> <Grid Grid.Row="3"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*"/> <RowDefinition Height="1*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">HP</TextBlock> <TextBlock Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">Att</TextBlock> <TextBlock Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">Size?</TextBlock> <TextBlock Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="0" HorizontalAlignment="Center">Def?</TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding HP, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Attack, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Size, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <ComboBox Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding X3, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Values --> <Grid Grid.Row="4"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" >Faints: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding FaintValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Faints, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" >Player Count: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding PlayerValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding PlayerCount, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" >Zenny Bonus Multiplier: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding ZennyValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding ZennyBonus, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" >Locale: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding LocaleChoices}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Locale, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" >Flourish: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding CurrentFlourish, IsAsync=True}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Flourish, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay, IsAsync=True}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="5" >Y0: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="5" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Y0, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="6" >Y3: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="6" ItemsSource = "{Binding CommonValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding Y3, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Rewards --> <Grid Grid.Row="5"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0">Rewards?: </TextBlock> <ComboBox Grid.Column="1" ItemsSource = "{Binding BoxValues}" SelectedItem= "{Binding BoxBonus, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, Mode = TwoWay}" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" /> </Grid> <!-- Rewards Display --> <Grid Grid.Row="6">
</Grid> <!-- Utility Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="7">
</Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </TabItem> <!-- Inventory ================================================================================--> </TabControl> </Grid>
</DockPanel>.../>
